OrgName.entry: PATIENT ADVICE AND LIAISON SERVICE, NHS SHEFFIELD

Desc.entry: Aims to act as the contact point to enable patients and the public to easily access the new system of patient and public involvement; to provide information to patients to help them make contact with the NHS as easily as possible; and to help resolve concerns quickly and efficiently and improve the outcome of care in the process.

Pubs.entry: Leaflet (or audio tape, available in community languages); posters
